title: Second-brain weekly notes system
description: Implement weekly note-taking system for second-brain. Capture inbox in weekly files, migrate to permanent notes periodically.
close_reason: Weekly notes system complete: Cmd+Shift+N launches/focuses note in workspace N, daily headers with dates, fzf-lua keymaps in Neovim

title: SSH configs audit and fix
description: sshf alias exists but SSH configs are broken. Audit ~/.ssh/config, fix issues, document hosts.

title: DBeaver config consolidation
description: Database configs spread across multiple tools. Consolidate connection strings and preferences in one place.

title: Nix-darwin Raycast double-launch bug
description: Raycast launches twice on startup via nix-darwin. Debug and fix the configuration.

title: Vivaldi keyboard-first workflow
description: Make Vivaldi more keyboard-driven: URL bar accessible without mouse, explore ovim or similar for input fields.

title: Sofle keyboard symbol keybinds
description: Some symbols are hard to type on Sofle keyboard. Review and adjust keymap for better symbol access.

title: Terminal sessions in Kitty/WezTerm
description: Miss tmux sessions when using Kitty or WezTerm. Explore native session management or lightweight tmux alternative.
close_reason: Kitty sessions working: Ctrl+f creates/switches sessions via fzf, Ctrl+s switches between existing sessions, tab_bar_filter isolates sessions like tmux workspaces
